title: WealthPulse
description: A comprehensive investment management platform designed to help users track, analyze, and optimize their investments in mutual funds, cryptocurrencies, and other financial instruments. Built during HackCBS8.0 with AI-driven insights and real-time data.
shortDescription: AI-powered investment management platform for tracking mutual funds and crypto with real-time insights.
features: Mutual Fund Dashboard: Track and analyze mutual funds with historical NAV, risk assessment, and Monte Carlo predictions.
Cryptocurrency Dashboard: Real-time crypto price tracking, risk analysis, and AI-driven insights.
Portfolio Management: Add, remove, and track investments in mutual funds and cryptocurrencies.
AI-Powered Insights: Get AI-generated analysis and reports for your investments.
Education Hub: Curated videos and trending financial news.
Authentication: Secure login and user management via Auth0.

title: FundHive
description: A social media-inspired crowdfunding and investment platform where entrepreneurs pitch startup ideas, verified by Aadhaar/PAN, and connect with investors or crowdfunders for equity or rewards.
shortDescription: Social crowdfunding platform connecting entrepreneurs with investors through verified pitches.
features: AI Insights: Groq-powered business viability score and analysis report.
Project Creation: Multi-step form to post startup ideas with details and media uploads.
Identity Verification: Aadhaar upload and PAN card input for creators.
Funding Options: Reward-based crowdfunding and equity investments with escrow system.
Negotiation: Custom amount/equity proposals with creator approval.
Social Engagement: Like, comment, and share projects in a dynamic feed.
Profile Management: Track investments, created projects, and negotiations.
Search & Filters: Browse projects by category, keyword, or trending status.
Notifications: Alerts for milestones and funding goal achievements.
Security: Auth0 authentication, AWS S3 for media uploads, and blockchain-simulated escrow.

title: Codev
description: A collaborative code editor with AI-powered assistance, real-time collaboration, file management, and multi-language execution support.
shortDescription: Real-time collaborative code editor with AI assistance and multi-language execution.
features: AI-Powered Assistance: Code completions, linting suggestions, and documentation generation.
File Management: Create, read, update, and delete project files.
Code Execution: Run code in multiple languages using JDoodle API.
Project Management: Create, list, and delete projects.
Real-Time Collaboration: Work with others via WebSockets.
Cloud Storage: Persistent storage with AWS S3.
Authentication: Secure login with Auth0.

title: Mass Mail Sender
description: A web application for sending personalized bulk emails with scheduling, tracking, and GDPR compliance features.
shortDescription: GDPR-compliant bulk email platform with personalization and tracking capabilities.
features: Personalized Emails: Tags like {{name}} and {{email}} for dynamic content.
Email Formats: Supports plain text, HTML, and Markdown.
Scheduling: Send emails at specific dates and times.
Tracking: Monitor open rates and click-through rates.
Batch Sending: Ensures compliance with service provider limits.
GDPR Compliance: Includes opt-out links and consent mechanisms.
Data Retention: Auto-deletes old campaigns and recipient data.
User Campaigns: Users manage only their campaigns.

title: AuthentiTest
description: AuthentiTest is a comprehensive online examination platform designed to ensure academic integrity through advanced face detection and plagiarism checks. The application leverages AWS Rekognition for real-time face verification, Groq API for AI-generated content and plagiarism analysis, and integrates seamlessly with MongoDB for data persistence.
shortDescription: Online exam platform with real-time face verification and AI/plagiarism detection.
features: Plagiarism & AI Detection: Analyze submitted answers to detect AI-generated content and plagiarism using Groq API.
User Authentication: Secure registration and login for both teachers and students.
Real-Time Face Detection: Continuous face scanning during exams to prevent impersonation using AWS Rekognition.
Dynamic Test Management: Teachers can create, assign, and manage tests; students can view assigned tests and submit answers.
Responsive UI: Built with React and Tailwind CSS for an intuitive user experience.
Socket.IO Integration: Real-time alerts and notifications for enhanced interactivity.

title: Trendora
description: Trendora is a full-stack e-commerce application that lets users browse, purchase, and manage products with a smooth, responsive UI and a powerful admin dashboard.
shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce app with product management, cart, checkout and admin dashboard.
features: User Authentication: Register, login, and profile management.
Product Browsing: Filter and sort products by category, price, brand, etc.
Shopping Cart: Add/remove products, update quantities, and view cart summary.
Checkout Process: Secure payments via PayPal or Cash on Delivery (COD).
Order Tracking: View order history and order details.
Responsive Design: Mobile-first UI with Tailwind CSS.
Chatbot Support: Predefined FAQs for quick customer support.
Admin Dashboard: Manage users, products, and orders with image uploads via Cloudinary.
